title: Underwater World
description:
‘Underwater World’ by Flori Bulduș is a captivating journey
into the ocean’s depths, part of the ‘Harmony of the Sea’ series.

With remarkable artistic mastery, Flori Bulduș captures the 
graceful movement of seaweed as it dances around marine life,
gently touching fish, starfish, and other underwater species.

This vibrant and colorful piece invites you to explore
an underwater universe rich in harmony and diversity.

‘Underwater World’ is a unique piece, bringing the magic of the
sea’s depths directly into your home.
